elements.description:
Datetime input element. Includes iron-ally-keys-behavior to limit keystrokes to only valid characters.

### Usage

  <px-datetime-entry-cell
    id="cell{{index}}"
    class="cell"
    order='{{index}}'
    moment-obj="[[momentObj]]"
    moment-format='[[item]]'
    time-zone="[[timeZone]]">
  </px-datetime-entry-cell>

properties.name: keyEventTarget
properties.description:
The EventTarget that will be firing relevant KeyboardEvents. Set it to
`null` to disable the listeners.

properties.name: stopKeyboardEventPropagation
properties.description:
If true, this property will cause the implementing element to
automatically stop propagation on any handled KeyboardEvents.

properties.name: _imperativeKeyBindings
properties.description: own properties of everything on the "prototype".

properties.name: keyBindings
properties.description:
Key bindings for iron-a11y-keys-behavior

More keyBindings are added in _addGeneralKeyBindings

properties.name: blockFutureDates
properties.description: Set this attribute when you do not want to allow future dates to be selected (future dates will be disabled and unclickable).

properties.name: blockPastDates
properties.description: Set this attribute when you do not want to allow past dates to be selected (past dates will be disabled and unclickable).

properties.name: __localizationCache
properties.description:
Internal singleton cache. This is the private implementation of the
behaviour; don't interact with it directly.

properties.name: language
properties.description: set a default for localizing

properties.name: resources
properties.description: used to pass in strings for localization
properties.defaultValue: {"en":{"Future dates are not allowed":"Future dates are not allowed","Past dates are not allowed":"Past dates are not allowed","Year":"Year","Month":"Month","Day":"Day","Hour":"Hour","Minute":"Minute","Second":"Second","Millisecond":"Millisecond","is not valid":"is not valid","This hour is not within a 12 hour clock":"This hour is not within a 12 hour clock"}}

properties.name: formats
useKeyIfMissing
properties.description:
Use the key for localization if value for  language is missing. Should
always be true for px components

properties.name: localize
properties.description:
Translates a string to the current `language`. Any parameters to the
string should be passed in order, as follows:
`localize(stringKey, param1Name, param1Value, param2Name, param2Value)`

properties.name: bubbleEvent
properties.description: If true, will bubble up the event to the parents

properties.name: timeZone
properties.description:
Moment-timezone string for using a specific timezone. See
http://momentjs.com/timezone/docs/#/data-loading/getting-zone-names/.

If not provided, tries to guess the current local timezone.

properties.name: minDate
properties.description: The minimum / earliest allowed date, as a a Moment object or an ISO 8601 String (dates before this will be disabled and unclickable).

properties.name: maxDate
properties.description: The maximum / latest allowed date, as a a Moment object or an ISO 8601 String (dates after this will be disabled and unclickable).

properties.name: momentObj
properties.description: Moment value with the date or time to display.  Will be parsed according to the moment format. (See momentFormat property.)

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Boolean stating if the current component is valid. Gets updated in '_validateInput'

properties.name: validationErrorMessage
properties.description: String used to describe the current invalid state

properties.name: momentFormat
properties.description:
Moment format tokens for the format to display/validate this field against (see http://momentjs.com/docs/#/parsing/string-format/)

Can only be configured statically; not data-bindable

`example: 'YYYY'`

properties.name: symbol
properties.description: The separator character, passed down from px-datetime-entry

properties.name: order
properties.description: Order number this cell is in px-datetime-entry, passed down from px-datetime-entry

properties.name: isSelected
properties.description: Whether the cell is currently selected. Read-only.

properties.name: _max
properties.description: Maximum numeric value for given field type.

properties.name: _min
properties.description: Minimum numeric value for given field type.

properties.name: _isNumber
properties.description:
Determine is the cell is a number
based off the `momentFormat`

properties.name: _cellLength
properties.description: Number of characters the cell is allow to be

methods.name: attached
methods.description: On attached, set up key bindings.

methods.name: addOwnKeyBinding
methods.description:
Can be used to imperatively add a key binding to the implementing
element. This is the imperative equivalent of declaring a keybinding
in the `keyBindings` prototype property.

methods.name: removeOwnKeyBindings
methods.description: When called, will remove all imperatively-added key bindings.

methods.name: keyboardEventMatchesKeys
methods.description: Returns true if a keyboard event matches `eventString`.

methods.name: __computeLocalize
methods.description: Returns a computed `localize` method, based on the current `language`.

methods.name: _preserveTime
methods.description:
Copies the time in toPreserve to dest and returns dest.
used in `px-calendar-picker`, `px-datetime-picker`, and `px-datetime-range-panel`

methods.name: _localeChanged
methods.description: Make sure the moment obj pick up the possibly new moment locale

methods.name: _timeZoneChanged
methods.description: Makes sure the moment object reflects the right timezone.

methods.name: _validateInput
methods.description: Validation function for 'px-datetime-entry'

methods.name: _validateField
methods.description:
Validate a complete field
called in px-datetime-field and px-datetime-range-field

params.name: funcOrigin
params.description: The function that called validation. Used for `_handleIncompleteEntries`

return.desc:
validation result:
- MomentObj - The validated new moment obj
- False - If the new moment is invalid
- FieldSame - If the new moment is the same as the old moment
- FieldBlank - If the visible field(s) are blank

methods.name: _validateMomentObj
methods.description:
Validate a moment object
called in from _validateField and px-datetime-field

return.desc:
validation result:
- MomentObj - The validated new moment obj
- False - If the new moment is invalid
- FieldSame - If the new moment is the same as the old moment

methods.name: _validField
methods.description: Reset field to valid

methods.name: _invalidField
methods.description:
Set field to invalid
Set validation Error Message, turn on validation error, set isValid to false, and fire event.

methods.name: _entryInputString
methods.description: loop through array of the entry cells and return a string of the value

methods.name: _determineValidationMessage
methods.description: Returns a meaningful validation message

methods.name: _updateValidationEvent
methods.description: Fires when 'validationErrorMessage' is changed

methods.name: _submitButtonState
methods.description: Sets the button state based on if validation has been passed or not. This in turn enables or disables the Submit button.

params.name: state
params.description: Where the validation has passed or failed

methods.name: _handleIncompleteEntries
methods.description:
If required any incomplete momentObj is invalid
If not required determine if the field is blank

params.name: fieldNodes
params.description: Object of date and time cell nodes

methods.name: _loopOverCellValues
methods.description:
Checking to see if all cells are empty
If a cell has a value return false

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the input value for the cell.

methods.name: setValueFromMoment
methods.description: Sets the value of the cell to the current moment obj

methods.name: _getType
methods.description: Set the correct type of input field based on the momentFormat

methods.name: _getDisabled
methods.description: Disables the input field for time zone entry cells.

methods.name: _sizeInputs
methods.description: Size the input fields based on the value or placeholder text

methods.name: _addGeneralKeyBindings
methods.description: Sets up regular key bindings

methods.name: _addSeparatorKeyBinding
methods.description: Sets up separator keybindings

methods.name: _updateInputValue
methods.description: If `momentObj` or `timeZone` update, reflect this in the cell

methods.name: _moveFocusBack
methods.description: Fires when 'left' key is hit

methods.name: _moveFocusForward
methods.description: Fires when 'right' key is hit

methods.name: _handleFocus
methods.description: Propagate the focus event up to entry to apply inline edit styles if applicable.

methods.name: _wraparound
methods.description:
Allow the user to loop through valid cell values
ex If the momentFormat is MM the cell value can go from 12 to 1 by hitting the up arrow

methods.name: _checkValue
methods.description:
Checks that the value has the correct number of digits for our format
Autocomplete function

methods.name: _handleBlur
methods.description: Fires on blur

methods.name: _toggleAMPM
methods.description: Toggles AM & PM when up/down or A/P keys are pressed.

methods.name: _setAMPM
methods.description: Sets the AM/PM value.

methods.name: _preventDeleteDefault
methods.description: Prevent the delete button from navigating back

methods.name: _placeholderText
methods.description: If the momentFormat format is not 'Z', 'ZZ', 'X', 'x', 'A' or 'a' then return the momentFormat

methods.name: _beforeCopy
methods.description: Handles before copy event, used for IE instead of the copy event

methods.name: _beforePaste
methods.description: Handles before paste event, used for IE instead of the paste event

methods.name: _handlePaste
methods.description: Handles paste event

methods.name: _handleCopy
methods.description: Handles copy event

methods.name: _convertMomentFormat
methods.description:
Format strings and setting/modification strings are different (?!?!)
This method converts one to the other

methods.name: _getMax
methods.description: Set the max value a token can be

methods.name: _getMin
methods.description: Set the min value a token can be

attributes.description: The maximum / latest allowed date, as a a Moment object or an ISO 8601 String (dates after this will be disabled and unclickable).

elements.description:
Range field component which displays a time or date and font awesome icon.

### Usage

    <px-datetime-entry
      moment="{{...}}"
      date-or-time="Date"
      moment-format="MM/DD/YYYY">
    </px-datetime-entry>

#### Styling
The following custom property is available for styling. Please also refer to px-forms-design for additional variables that can be used to customize the field's appearance.

Custom property | Description
:----------------|:-------------
`--px-datetime-read-only-text-color` | Text color for the text timezones
`--px-datetime-entry-selected` | Text highlight color when a cell is selected
`--px-datetime-icon-color` | Color of the icons
`--px-validation-error-text-color` | Color of invalid text

properties.name: keyEventTarget
properties.description:
The EventTarget that will be firing relevant KeyboardEvents. Set it to
`null` to disable the listeners.

properties.name: stopKeyboardEventPropagation
properties.description:
If true, this property will cause the implementing element to
automatically stop propagation on any handled KeyboardEvents.

properties.name: _imperativeKeyBindings
properties.description: own properties of everything on the "prototype".

properties.name: keyBindings
properties.description:
To be used to express what combination of keys  will trigger the relative
callback. e.g. `keyBindings: { 'esc': '_onEscPressed'}`

properties.name: blockFutureDates
properties.description: Set this attribute when you do not want to allow future dates to be selected (future dates will be disabled and unclickable).

properties.name: blockPastDates
properties.description: Set this attribute when you do not want to allow past dates to be selected (past dates will be disabled and unclickable).

properties.name: __localizationCache
properties.description:
Internal singleton cache. This is the private implementation of the
behaviour; don't interact with it directly.

properties.name: language
properties.description: set a default for localizing

properties.name: resources
properties.description: used to pass in strings for localization
properties.defaultValue: {"en":{"Future dates are not allowed":"Future dates are not allowed","Past dates are not allowed":"Past dates are not allowed","Year":"Year","Month":"Month","Day":"Day","Hour":"Hour","Minute":"Minute","Second":"Second","Millisecond":"Millisecond","is not valid":"is not valid","This hour is not within a 12 hour clock":"This hour is not within a 12 hour clock"}}

properties.name: formats
useKeyIfMissing
properties.description:
Use the key for localization if value for  language is missing. Should
always be true for px components

properties.name: localize
properties.description:
Translates a string to the current `language`. Any parameters to the
string should be passed in order, as follows:
`localize(stringKey, param1Name, param1Value, param2Name, param2Value)`

properties.name: bubbleEvent
properties.description: If true, will bubble up the event to the parents

properties.name: timeZone
properties.description:
Moment-timezone string for using a specific timezone. See
http://momentjs.com/timezone/docs/#/data-loading/getting-zone-names/.

If not provided, tries to guess the current local timezone.

properties.name: minDate
properties.description: The minimum / earliest allowed date, as a a Moment object or an ISO 8601 String (dates before this will be disabled and unclickable).

properties.name: maxDate
properties.description: The maximum / latest allowed date, as a a Moment object or an ISO 8601 String (dates after this will be disabled and unclickable).

properties.name: momentObj
properties.description: Moment value with the date or time to display.  Will be parsed according to the moment format. (See momentFormat property.)

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Boolean stating if the current component is valid. Gets updated in '_validateInput'

properties.name: validationErrorMessage
properties.description: String used to describe the current invalid state

properties.name: dateOrTime
properties.description:
Date or Time icon/text

Format is 'Date' or 'Time'

properties.name: momentFormat
properties.description:
Moment format string for the format to display/validate this field against
(see http://momentjs.com/docs/#/parsing/string-format/)

properties.name: hideIcon
properties.description: Whether to hide the calendar or clock icon

properties.name: _cellFormatArray
properties.description: An array of tokens (e.g. ["YY","MM", "DD"])

properties.name: _symbolCharArray
properties.description: An array of the separator characters (e.g. ["/","/"])

properties.name: showTimeZone
properties.description:
Determines how to display the timezone:
- 'dropdown': shows the timezone as a dropdown which the user can use to select a different timezone. Only contains a subset of all timezones.
**NOTE: this collection of timezones uses the POSIX convention for timezone offset, meaning that positive values correspond to timezones WEST of GMT and negative values correspond to timezones EAST of GMT.**
- 'extendedDropdown': shows the timezone as a dropdown which the user can use to select a different timezone. Contains all existing timezones (588)
- 'text': shows the timezone as text, non editable
- 'abbreviatedText': shows the timezone as an abbreviated text, non editable (e.g. UTC, PST, EST, etc)

properties.name: isSelected
properties.description: True if any cell is currently selected.

methods.name: attached
methods.description: calls `_formatChanged` if `momentFormat` is defined

methods.name: addOwnKeyBinding
methods.description:
Can be used to imperatively add a key binding to the implementing
element. This is the imperative equivalent of declaring a keybinding
in the `keyBindings` prototype property.

methods.name: removeOwnKeyBindings
methods.description: When called, will remove all imperatively-added key bindings.

methods.name: keyboardEventMatchesKeys
methods.description: Returns true if a keyboard event matches `eventString`.

methods.name: __computeLocalize
methods.description: Returns a computed `localize` method, based on the current `language`.

methods.name: _preserveTime

Copies the time in toPreserve to dest and returns dest.
used in `px-calendar-picker`, `px-datetime-picker`, and `px-datetime-range-panel`

methods.description: Make sure the moment obj pick up the possibly new moment locale

methods.name: _timeZoneChanged

Validate a complete field
called in px-datetime-field and px-datetime-range-field

params.name: funcOrigin
params.description: The function that called validation. Used for `_handleIncompleteEntries`

return.desc:
validation result:
- MomentObj - The validated new moment obj
- False - If the new moment is invalid
- FieldSame - If the new moment is the same as the old moment
- FieldBlank - If the visible field(s) are blank

called in from _validateField and px-datetime-field

return.desc:

- MomentObj - The validated new moment obj

- FieldSame - If the new moment is the same as the old moment

methods.name: _validField
methods.description: Reset field to valid

methods.name: _invalidField
methods.description:
Set field to invalid
Set validation Error Message, turn on validation error, set isValid to false, and fire event.

methods.name: _entryInputString
methods.description: loop through array of the entry cells and return a string of the value

methods.name: _determineValidationMessage
methods.description: Returns a meaningful validation message

methods.name: _updateValidationEvent
methods.description: Fires when 'validationErrorMessage' is changed

methods.name: _submitButtonState
methods.description: Sets the button state based on if validation has been passed or not. This in turn enables or disables the Submit button.

params.name: state
params.description: Where the validation has passed or failed

methods.name: _handleIncompleteEntries
methods.description:
If required any incomplete momentObj is invalid
If not required determine if the field is blank

params.name: fieldNodes
params.description: Object of date and time cell nodes

methods.name: _loopOverCellValues
methods.description:
Checking to see if all cells are empty
If a cell has a value return false

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the input value for each entry-cell input field.

methods.name: setValueFromMoment
methods.description: Resets the input value for each entry-cell input field to the current momentObj.

methods.name: _formatChanged
methods.description:
runs when `momentFormat` is changed
Updates `_cellFormatArray` and `_symbolCharArray` if one of them as changed

methods.name: _sizeSymbols
methods.description: create a dummy canvas to measure string and make size the input correctly

methods.name: _splitFormat
methods.description: Regex that splits the `momentFormat` into two arrays. One for the tokens and one for the separators

methods.name: _isSymbol
methods.description:
Helper function for a dom-if
Determines if the `_symbolCharArray` of `index` is null or undefined

methods.name: _returnSymbol
methods.description: return a string of the separation symbols

methods.name: _setIcon
methods.description: helper to determine whether to diplay the calendar or clock icon

methods.name: _entryCellMove
methods.description: handle arrow keys switching cells or firing events to above components

methods.name: _handleBlur
methods.description: when `px-cell-blurred` is fired run `_validateInput`

methods.name: _handleDropdownFocus
methods.description: Catches the `on-focus-changed` from `px-dropdown` and fires this up for `px-datetime-field`

methods.name: _handleDropdownBlur
methods.description: Catches the `on-blur-changed` from `px-dropdown` and fires this up for `px-datetime-field`

methods.name: _showTimeZoneText
methods.description:
used in a dom-if
determines whether to display the `text` or `abbreviatedText` option

methods.name: _showTimeZoneDropdown
methods.description:
used in a dom-if
determines whether to display the `dropdown` or `extendedDropdown` option

methods.name: _getTimeZoneList
methods.description:
Create the `extendedDropdown` and `dropdown` items for `px-dropdown`

If showTimeZone is not `extendedDropdown` or `dropdown` return and empty array.
Because of a timing issue `_getTimeZoneList` can be called before `_showTimeZoneDropdown`
causing an issue if the dropdown tries to redraw without `items` being defined.

methods.name: _updateTimeZone
methods.description: when `px-dropdown-selection-changed` is fired update `timeZone`

methods.name: _getIconClass
methods.description: Determines what classes should show on the label icon

methods.name: _getTimeZoneTextClass
methods.description: css helper. If a dropdown is showing add a margin-left of 10px;

methods.name: _iconClicked
methods.description: This event is fired when the calendar or clock icon has been clicked

If a cell has a value return false

attributes.name: language
attributes.description: set a default for localizing

attributes.name: resources
attributes.description: List of key/values to be included for translating this component

attributes.name: formats
use-key-if-missing
attributes.description:
Use the key for localization if value for  language is missing. Should
always be true for  our components

attributes.name: localize
attributes.description:
Translates a string to the current `language`. Any parameters to the
string should be passed in order, as follows:
`localize(stringKey, param1Name, param1Value, param2Name, param2Value)`

attributes.name: bubble-event
attributes.description: If true, will bubble up the event to the parents

attributes.name: validation-error-message
attributes.description: String used to describe the current invalid state

attributes.name: is-submit-button-valid
attributes.description: Whether the Submit button should be valid

attributes.name: hide-submit
attributes.description: Hides the Submit button when true

attributes.name: hide-cancel
attributes.description: Hides the Cancel button when true

attributes.name: submit-icon
attributes.description: Icon to be used for the Submit button

elements.description:
The list of preset ranges in the rangepicker modal.

### Usage

    <px-datetime-presets preset-ranges="{{...}}">
    </px-datetime-presets>

properties.name: __localizationCache
properties.description:
Internal singleton cache. This is the private implementation of the
behaviour; don't interact with it directly.
